text:
Omni Labs, Inc. | San Francisco | ONSITE Full-Time | $70-$100k | https://omniinc.com

We’re reinventing how brands will approach marketing. Currently, people (marketers) determine which vendors and strategies to use in order to maximize return. Within a few years, this entire process will be done via autonomous systems and we're building the self-driving car that companies will use to grow. With over 300 brands piping us all of the data required to build this system and paid pilots to prove it, we’re well on our way to building the first fully automated digital marketer. Come be a part of this!

We are looking for someone who can own our frontend stack. Apply at: https://angel.co/omnilabs/jobs/322926-senior-front-end-js-en...
